sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.8%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble Company has lost about 16.6% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Cisco Systems ( CSCO ), trading down 2.0%.
Cisco Systems is showing a gain of 14.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Boeing ( BA ), trading down 1.6%, and Nike ( NKE ), trading up 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
